Was lucky enough to spend yesterday morning with this bombshell who recently celebrated her 97th birthday. This necklace, by pioneering modernist jeweler Haroldo Burle Marx (1911-1991), features the most gorgeously-hued polished aquamarine drops which may be suspended from the gold necklace in whatever pattern/order you choose. It will be in the November auction along with some other stunning pieces from this amazing lady's collection. And how fun that she has pictures of her wearing it all over the years? Suffice it to say she's just as beautiful today as she was 40 years ago 😍
💎
💎
💎
